Frquently Asked Questions

1. What is a COVID-19 vaccine?
2. Are COVID-19 vaccines safe?
3. How do COVID-19 vaccines work?
4. Who should get the COVID-19 vaccine?
5. What are the side effects of COVID-19 vaccines?
6. How many doses of the COVID-19 vaccine are required?
7. Can I get COVID-19 after being vaccinated?
8. How long does immunity from COVID-19 vaccines last?
9. Are COVID-19 vaccines effective against new variants?
10. Do COVID-19 vaccines have long-term effects?
11. Can I take other medications before or after getting the vaccine?
12. Can pregnant or breastfeeding women receive the COVID-19 vaccine?
13. Where can I get the COVID-19 vaccine?
14. Do I still need to follow safety measures after vaccination?
15. Can I choose which COVID-19 vaccine I receive?
